this_title: Silent Night: A Song for the World
trans_title: 平安夜：传唱世界的圣诞歌曲
introduction: It’s a documentary about the creation and success of the world’s most known Christmas Carol. It’s a song composed in 1818 translated into 140 about Languages. A song, which stopped World War 1 at Christmas and it’s the third best selling single of all time by Bing Crosby.
chinese_title: 平安夜：传唱世界的圣诞歌曲
foreign_title: Silent Night: A Song for the World
